17.ara-name: كتاب الحدود عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Ikrimah:That 'Ali burnt some people who apostasized from Islam. This news reached Ibn 'Abbas, so he said: "If it were me I would have killed them according to the statement of Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever changes his religion then kill him.' And I would not have burned them because the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Do not punish with the punishment of Allah.' So this reached 'Ali, and he said: "Ibn 'Abbas has told the truth

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Apostate
